Question 8

x1 = 10000000000000000000000000000000
y1 = 20000000000000000000000000000000

x2 = ?
y2 = 30000000000000000000000000000000

aes(y1, x1) = c3b39ef62b853d8b2b6a72dc630a3ec0
aes(y1, x1) ^ y1 ^ y2 = d3b39ef62b853d8b2b6a72dc630a3ec0
x2 = aes-1(y2, d3b39ef62b853d8b2b6a72dc630a3ec0)
x2 = b082b5ab3179fc06bc53b2d29c57a0b4

aes(y1, x1) ^ y1 = 0xe3b39ef62b853d8b2b6a72dc630a3ec0L
aes(y2, x2) ^ y2 = 0xe3b39ef62b853d8b2b6a72dc630a3ec0L

Question 9

x4 = 50000000000000000000000000000000
aes(x4, x4) = c73f6a454d5fb0af03c3df84a5822274
y4 = 60000000000000000000000000000000
x3 = 70000000000000000000000000000000
aes(x3, x3) = 71a785d6ccdf63573f9c6f759c73445c

y3 = d698ef938180d3f83c5fb0f139f16628

aes(x3, x3) ^ y3 = 0xa73f6a454d5fb0af03c3df84a5822274L
aes(x4, x4) ^ y4 = 0xa73f6a454d5fb0af03c3df84a5822274L
